title: Has Bobby Met His Girlfriend’s Parents? + Lunchbox Upset His Wife Got Their Son A Doll + Surgeon General Jerome Adams Talks Coronavirus
itunes:title: Has Bobby Met His Girlfriend’s Parents? + Lunchbox Upset His Wife Got Their Son A Doll + Surgeon General Jerome Adams Talks Coronavirus
description:
Bobby answers questions from the text line including if he has met his girlfriend’s parents yet, does he wipe his credit cards and if we dance during the Dance Party! Lunchbox is upset that BabyBox is walking around with a doll. We talk to Surgeon General Jerome Adams about how we can protect ourselves during the coronavirus epidemic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
